long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate web commenting tool! With our extension installed, you can leave your thoughts and opinions on any website, no matter where you are. And the best part is, anyone with the extension installed can see and interact with your comments. Whether you're looking to have a conversation with like-minded individuals, or just want to share your thoughts on a particular page, our extension makes it easy. So why wait? Install now and start commenting on the web like never before!

How to use ? 

After installing the extension, go to any website you want.
Right click on the "Add Comment" option.
Hover over the information you want to add a comment and right-click.
Enter the comment you want to enter through the modal that opens and send it.
Select the plugin from the top right corner and tick the load comments checkbox. 
The icon will appear where comments are added. 
Move your mouse over the icons and wait you will see the comment
